segments.text: your mp3 looks so cool . Where did you get it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: really ? Do you often shop online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . I buy most of my daily necessities online .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never tried E-shopping . Is it better than shopping at an actual store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , much better . You can log in a website , browse through many items and categories comfortably at home , order the goods , pay by credit or debit card , and the goods will be delivered to your home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds good , and I don't have to queue up at the cashier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: and you can still go " window shopping " just like in a real shopping mall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , are there any other advantages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , most of the shops are closed at 22 or even earlier , but the internet operates 24 hours a day , seven days a week , and can be accessed anywhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: are there many choices of online shopping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure . You can buy almost anything you can think of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: perhaps I should have a try .
segments.speaker: S1
